projects.title: Joulupukin Kuuma linja HTML5 broadcast graphics

picture.alt: Placeholder Icon, before Kuumalinja 2024 has been released.

projects.description: I created the technical side of the Joulupunkin kuuma linja 2024 using HTML5-graphics, this included animations, data fetching and displaying of the data during the broadcast. This post links to the broadcast available at Yle areena!

projects.title: Python Backend for Wolt Assignment
projects.description: A simple well tested Flask HTTP endpoint for calculating a delivery fee based on multiple delivery details like distance and amount of items
